sentence: I have stayed at a Sunrise Beach Bungalow 207 which had a beautiful beach just steps from the nice but small pool different from Landa where my room did not have a beach in front even it was also a Beach Bungalow
Also the room lack of some privacy some of the windows were facing a public passage and are too close to one another
Compared to the resort at Landa it has smaller size of guest room and facilities but will provide you more local feel
During our stay we had booked two rooms since there were six of us
One of the rooms had a minor condensation issue on the roof minor enough that we did not even feel the need to complain
away from room to beach and 2 long
I have heared one of the staff saying that the management is considering demolishing all of the current villas and rebuilding them with a much better looking design
The interior of the villa is nice but as I said it is not luxurious at all and I do not believe it worth the price I have paid
I tried swimming in front of my villa but the sea has lots of stones
We had large balconies on all sides of the bungalow with stairs leading to the water so we could snorkel right there
We had a overwater bungalow and the views were stunningly beautiful There was so much ocean life to observe form our patio
Before long the island comes into view
Comfortable clean everything you can think of in the room
Beautiful room overlooking the villa inifinity pool with sliding doors to go right to the pool
Our beach villa was beautiful and only steps from the sea
The villas facilities and food at FS KH are stunning is a key factor but to our family the services offered by the staff in this resort is the most important factor
The housekeeping staff did beautiful job keeping the suite immaculate and the pool crystal clear
We stayed in the beach villa and it comes with a private pool and can have access to the beach
So too was the heart shaped balloon placed in our villa for our anniversary celebration
Thanks to Maximilian Schilick Director of Rooms and Maxime Lureau Director of Spa who not only kept the resort sparkling but were warm and welcoming
